body_html:
Hi @andrewharp ,
Thanks for the reply. I modified the code in port.cc, and logged the return value of NumSchedulableCPUs, which is 8. Still, my phone is using only 4 cores.
Are there other restrictions on tensorflow framework? Or, maybe 4 cores are the most that the framework can use - the bottleneck is not on computation?
body_text:
Hi @andrewharp ,
Thanks for the reply. I modified the code in port.cc, and logged the return value of NumSchedulableCPUs, which is 8. Still, my phone is using only 4 cores.
Are there other restrictions on tensorflow framework? Or, maybe 4 cores are the most that the framework can use - the bottleneck is not on computation?
body:
Hi @andrewharp ,
Thanks for the reply. I modified the code in port.cc, and logged the return value of NumSchedulableCPUs, which is 8. Still, my phone is using only 4 cores.
Are there other restrictions on tensorflow framework? Or, maybe 4 cores are the most that the framework can use - the bottleneck is not on computation?
